Class SensorGraphView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • it.ncorti.emgvisualizer.ui.views.SensorGraphView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class SensorGraphView
extends android.view.View
    Custom view for viewing graph of raw datas

    Nicola
